title: Neo humanoid maker 1X releases world model to help bots learn what they see
description: 1X released a new world model that it says is a solid step toward its robots being able to teach themselves new tasks.
content: 1X released a new world model that it says is a solid step toward its robots being able to teach themselves new tasks.
